comment.author: Alyssa
comment.text: There is a prayer movement sweeping across the country for Donald Trump. More and more roadblocks are popping up to stop him. If he is your choice, please share a prayer at 10 am and 7 pm that God will take him to the presidency. Feel free to share this post.

replies.author: Jasmine-Lee
replies.text: well said Alyssaee,love to chat with u add me

replies.author: Zachary
replies.text: I was raised to pray "If it be THY will," or "THY will, not mine." How are you going to tell God what to do? SMH

replies.author: Alex
replies.text: That is disgusting. Keep God out of politics!!!!!! Blasphemous.
